exchangeLuckyballComment: U lopolotse lintlha tsa hau bakeng sa Bolo ea Lehlohonolo.
inviteLuckyballComment: U fumane Lucky Ball bakeng sa ho memela motsoalle.
purchaseGiftCardByPoint: U lopolotse lintlha bakeng sa karete ea mpho.
purchaseProductByPoint: U lopolotse lintlha tsa hau bakeng sa thepa.
luckyDrawUseBallComment: U sebelisitse Bolo ea Lehlohonolo ho kenya Lucky Drw.
winLotteryPointComment: U filoe lintlha ka lebaka la ho hapa Lotto.
partnerMailTitle: Tataiso ea Kopo ea Molekane oa BUFLEXZ
partnerMailContents1: Ka kopo, sheba litokomane tse hlokahalang bakeng sa tumello ea molekane 'me u romelle karabo ka faele e khomaretsoeng!
partnerMailContents3:
Ka kopo, hokela kopi ea karete ea hau ea boitsebiso kapa phasepoto
ho netefatsa boitsebiso ba molekane oa hau.
partnerMailContents5:
Ka kopo, sheba litokomane le lintlha tse hlokahalang
bakeng sa tumello ea molekane 'me u re romelle karabo!
partnerMailContents6: (Mofuta oa transaction, nomoro ea ho tsamaisa, nomoro ea ak'haonte, lebitso la pele la mong'a akhaonto, lebitso la bohareng, fane, nomoro ea mohala ea moamoheli, jj.)
partnerMailContents8:
Ka kopo, re romelle nomoro ea mohala moo u ka fumanoang teng
ho buisana le molekane wa hao.
partnerMailContents9:
Ka kopo, romella karabo ea hau ka lengolo-tsoibila ho partner@buflexz.com .
Kamora hore sehlopha sa ts'ebetso se hlahlobe karabo, tlhahlobo ea balekane le tumello li tla sebetsoa.
authMailTitle: Lintlha tsa nomoro ea netefatso ea BUFLEXZ
authMailContents1: Re tla u romella nomoro ea netefatso ea lengolo-tsoibila.
authMailContents3: Senotlolo sa netefatso se fanoe bakeng sa netefatso ea lengolo-tsoibila.
authMailContents4:
Ka kopo, kenya nomoro ea netefatso ea linomoro tse 6 ka kotloloho ho netefatso
fensetere ka har'a sesebelisoa kapa kopitsa le ho beha nomoro ea netefatso.
authMailContents5:
Imeile ena ke ea ho romelloa feela.
Likarabo ha li khonehe, kahoo haeba u na le lipotso kapa lit≈°itiso,
ka kopo ikopanye le rona ka setsi sa bareki ka har'a sesebelisoa sa BUFLEXZ.
